ud8.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud8.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhu nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
ud8.4:1.4: Tedha bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbam cetaso samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
ud8.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud8.4:3.6: Cutupapate asati nevidha na huram na ubhayamantarena.
